ComicInfo.Summary:
The newest re-mastered debut from Aspen's Big Dog Ink imprint continues!
Critter hits the town with her new friend and ally, but is the famed life of a celebrity going to be too much for her to handle?
Featuring re-mastered content, an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at Critter, creator commentary and more! Don't miss out on the second of Aspen's all new BDI launch titles with the return of CRITTER!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Market Cover A | Fico Ossio | 1 | B | Direct Market Cover B | Corey Zayatz | 2 | C | 1:8 Retailer Incentive Exclusive Variant Cover | Fico Ossio | 3 |
